name: Double Trouble (lainwave, joylychi, sarinda)
description:
This game was made for GMTK Jam 2021 for the theme: Joined Together

Double Trouble is a deck-building rapid fire boss rush! Play by yourself or with friend as a pair of spellcasting siblings against a colorful cast of foes. Individually, their magic is strong, but together, they dish out double the trouble! 

Nevertheless, watch out! Not all spells synergize. Only with your powers joined together can you defeat the enemy!

Controls:

Single Player:

  • Mouse - Choose card

Two Players:

ControlsPlayer 1Player 2Choose left cardALeft arrow key
Choose middle cardW or SUp or Down arrow keyChoose right cardDRight arrow key
